title: NHANES LBDGLUSI Variable Definition Cohort Definition

extension.valueMarkdown: NHANES LBDGLUSI Variable Definition Cohort Definition [Database Entry: FHIR Group Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper [Authors/Creators]. valueExpression.description: The fasting glucose value in mg/dL (LBXGLU) was converted to mmol/L (LBDGLUSI) by multiplying by 0.05551 (rounded to 3 decimals).

description: This Group Resource is referenced in an example for the EBMonFHIR Implementation Guide.
